ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Output-Based Pricing System Regulations and the Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the OUTPUT-BASED PRICING SYSTEM REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that the incentive to reduce GHG emissions in the federal Output-Based Pricing System (OPBS) is maintained by adding rules respecting transitional matters related to the deletion of the name of a province or territory from Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act (GGPPA) and related to circumstances in which a facility ceases to be a covered facility; (2) increase the accuracy of the values of output, GHG emissions and emissions limits calculated by covered facilities by adjusting quantification rules; and (3) clarify various provisions of the regulatory text.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0197 Publication Date: 2021-09-01
